1331880.name: MALTIVA
1331880.description:
Complexity Island game is a survival game to get food and survive the dangers

Building houses, farms, energy buildings, sailing ships, planes and cars

The game contains many selections or special things like

Weapons and food, as well as the system of trade or exchange between two people

The game world is vast in terms of construction places or resources that make the game complex

But at the same time fun and there will be in the future more than 5 maps

It will enable you through ships and the Golden Port to other mabat and the establishment of a trading system

And earn money and trade
1331880.supported_languages:
英语*, 阿拉伯语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
